CustomField.defaultValue: "Application form (detailed guidance can be downloaded from the website or requested by email)" + BR() + BR() + "Proof of 2 years of clinical experience (from supervisor or head of department)" + BR() + BR() + "Structured curriculum vitae including list of publications (10 max, doi-links)" + BR() + BR() + "A copy of passport / national ID card" + BR() + BR() + "2 letters of recommendation from neurologists" + BR() + BR() + "Acceptance form or letter of acceptance from the approved hosting department"
CustomField.label: Application Material
